name: Rust

on:
  push:
    branches: [ "main" ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ "main" ]

env:
  CARGO_TERM_COLOR: always

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Install alsa libs
      run: |
        sudo apt-get update
        sudo apt-get install -y rust-all libstd-rust-dev librust-alsa-dev librust-udev-dev libx11-dev libxext-dev libxft-dev libxinerama-dev libxcursor-dev libxrender-dev libxfixes-dev libpango1.0-dev libgl1-mesa-dev libglu1-mesa-dev cmake gettext 
    - name: show rustc version
      run: rustc --version
    - uses: actions/checkout@v4
    - name: Build
      run: cargo build --verbose --release
    - name: Run tests
      run: cargo test --verbose
